QuestData.Title: The Spoils of War
QuestData.Description: While the Blackrock orcs still swarm in their spire, I doubt their plans will take them anywhere near the innocent people of Redridge anytime soon. You and Ariok saw to that.$b$bI'd say we were fairly resourceful here in Burning Steppes - those warlock supplies we collected certainly came in handy, as did the obsidian ash that we used to conceal our dragon.$b$bThere were, however, some collected items left over. Please, take your pick before you move on, beyond the steppes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Inspect the Box of Left Over Supplies at Flame Crest in Burning Steppes.
